title: AI teddy bear pulled after giving sex advice
text:
Pageant veteran sets sights on Miss Universe crown

Ahtisa Manalo has competed in beauty contests for 18 years. With the weight of a pageant-crazed nation behind her, the Philippines' representative is taking a shot at the 'Super Bowl' of pageants, Miss Universe, in what will be her final competition. Watch Ahtisa Manaloâ€™s journey on All Access.
